Package moa.evaluation

Class BasicRegressionPerformanceEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • moa.evaluation.BasicRegressionPerformanceEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CapabilitiesHandler, LearningPerformanceEvaluator<Example<Instance>>, RegressionPerformanceEvaluator, MOAObject

    public class BasicRegressionPerformanceEvaluator
extends AbstractMOAObject
implements RegressionPerformanceEvaluator
    Regression evaluator that performs basic incremental evaluation.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Albert Bifet (abifet at cs dot waikato dot ac dot nz)
